name: PaceLite
description:
Made in 48h for Miz Jam. Try it!

Ever wondered what would playing rougelike be like in a dynamic way? Wonder no more! PaceLite is an arena-rougelite game where every move gets performed with the music beats giving it a thrill of emotion every move you make. I hope you can make decisions FAST! All that in a heavy dark-fantasy climat with atmospheric homemade music. 

You don't need to be a musician, it's not a musical game. It just uses the music and beats for the pacing! No penalties if you cannot hit the beat.

PS. The mysterious sleeping knights are watching your struggle to survive..
